prompt: Discuss how the integration of educational technology can enhance teaching and learning, and analyze best practices for effective implementation in classrooms.

criteria.name: Understanding of Technology Integration Frameworks
criteria.description: Demonstrates a deep understanding of models such as SAMR and TPACK for integrating technology in education.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Clearly explains multiple frameworks/models and their application with detailed examples.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes key concepts and applies them with some examples.
performance_descriptors.average: Mentions technology integration in general terms.

criteria.name: Analysis of Impact on Teaching and Learning
criteria.description: Evaluates how technology integration affects student engagement, motivation, and outcomes.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Insightfully assesses positive impacts and potential challenges with supporting evidence.

criteria.name: Use of Research and Practical Examples
criteria.description: Effectively incorporates research studies and classroom case studies to support discussion.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Integrates diverse research and real-world examples critically.
performance_descriptors.good: Cites relevant research and examples with some integration.
performance_descriptors.needs_improvement: Minimal or unclear use of evidence.

criteria.name: Strategies for Effective Technology Implementation
criteria.description: Presents detailed and practical strategies for integrating technology successfully in diverse classrooms.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Provides innovative, feasible, and scalable recommendations addressing typical barriers.

criteria.name: Academic Writing and Structure
criteria.description: Clarity, coherence, and scholarly tone of writing.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Essay is well-structured, clear, and academically rigorous.
performance_descriptors.good: Mostly well-organized and clear with minor lapses.
performance_descriptors.average: Moderate structure with occasional unclear expression.

key_points: Explain SAMR and TPACK models and how they guide educational technology integration.
Analyze research on how technology enhances student motivation, engagement, and learning outcomes.
Discuss challenges such as access, teacher preparedness, and digital equity.
Recommend strategies for professional development, infrastructure planning, and pedagogical adaptation.
Present a well-structured and formally written academic essay.
llm_questions: What are the main models of technology integration in education?
How can technology improve student engagement and achievement?
What does research say about effective use of educational technology?
What challenges do teachers face in integrating technology?
What strategies can help overcome barriers to technology use?
How can equitable access to technology be ensured?
What role does professional development play in technology integration?
